name: Day To Dream
description:
Day to Dream is a short cinematic experience designed to relax and intrigue! No need for clicking or a keyboard, just use the mouse to look around and enjoy the ocean breeze!

Created by Nathaniel Bott, Samantha Patajac and Zahraa Al Zubaydi 
https://twitter.com/mr_natbug
https://twitter.com/Zap_Alzo

Confession time: there is a small bug in the game where a Unity crash will occur when you exit the game, either by hitting Q or at the end of the game. Pretty sure this is a memory leak in one of the new Unity packages I was experimenting with. Sorry!
